message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and we're confident it will meet all your needs. Let's make this a win-win situation. We're offering the product for $110. We believe this price reflects its value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your product, $110 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $105 for it.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. We propose a price of $108 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We hope this proposal works for you.
